mapper.select: select * from t_user where username=#{0} and password=#{1}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (USERID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, REALNAME, DID, JID, OPENTIME, SEX, CITY, PID, TELEPHONE, EMAIL, MOBILE, ADDRESS, MARRIED, salt) values (#{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opentime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{married,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_user
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DID = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER},
JID = #{jid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPENTIME = #{opentime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARRIED = #{married,jdbcType=INTEGER},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DID = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JID = #{jid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OPENTIME = #{opentime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARRIED = #{married,jdbcType=INTEGER}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
